amendatorysection.para: Regular meetings of the board of directors shall be held on the first Wednesday of each calendar month at such hour as the board may designate and at such other stated times as shall be fixed in the bylaws. Special meetings of the board may be held at any time at the call of the chairperson or at the request of any two members filed in writing with the secretary. All meetings of the board, any of its committees, or committees of its employees shall be public.
